attributes.action: Amend this website so that it can save our details
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This website is a wonderful idea, spoiled only by having to enter the same details each and every time we want to interact with the site.

If this were a commercial site, there would be a facility to "Remember Me" so that our details could be stored in a cookie.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
